subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Erik Karlsson’s two goals lifted Sweden over the Czech Republic and Simon Moser’s score with 7.9 seconds left lifted Switzerland over Latvia as the Olympic men’s hockey tournament began.
snippet: Erik Karlsson’s two goals lifted Sweden over the Czech Republic and Simon Moser’s score with 7.9 seconds left lifted Switzerland over Latvia as the Olympic men’s hockey tournament began.
